original_title: President Ranil expresses shock over Trump assassination attempt
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has expressed his shock about the assassination attempt on Donald Trump and said he was relieved to learn that the former U.S. President is safe.
The President stated that Sri Lankans have been at the receiving end of such violence in politics, and urged all to adhere to the laws protecting Democracy, the President’s Media Division reported.
